ç”¨æˆ·æƒ³è¦äº†è§£ Vue ç»„ä»¶çš„ç¼–å†™æ¨¡å¼å’Œç»“æ„ï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿èƒ½å¤Ÿç¼–å†™ React ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„ destyler-uiã€‚æˆ‘éœ€è¦åˆ†æ Vue åŒ…ä¸­çš„ç»„ä»¶ç»“æ„ï¼Œäº†è§£å®ƒä»¬æ˜¯å¦‚ä½•ç»„ç»‡çš„ï¼Œç„¶åå¸®åŠ©ç”¨æˆ·ç†è§£å¦‚ä½•å°†è¿™äº›æ¨¡å¼åº”ç”¨åˆ° React ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸­ã€‚

è®©æˆ‘å…ˆæŸ¥çœ‹ Vue ç»„ä»¶çš„ç»“æ„ï¼Œç‰¹åˆ«æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´çš„ç»„ä»¶ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼ˆå¦‚ collapse æˆ– collapsibleï¼‰ï¼Œç„¶åæ¯”è¾ƒ React ç‰ˆæœ¬ç›®å‰çš„å®ç°çŠ¶æ€ã€‚æˆ‘æ¥å¸®ä½ åˆ†æ Vue ç»„ä»¶çš„ç¼–å†™æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œä»¥åŠå¦‚ä½•å°†å…¶åº”ç”¨åˆ° React ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚è®©æˆ‘å…ˆæŸ¥çœ‹ Vue ç»„ä»¶çš„ç»“æ„å’Œç»„ç»‡æ–¹å¼ã€‚ è®©æˆ‘æŸ¥çœ‹ä¸€ä¸ªå…¸å‹çš„ Vue ç»„ä»¶å®Œæ•´ç»“æ„ï¼Œä»¥ collapse ä¸ºä¾‹ï¼š å¾ˆå¥½ï¼Œè®©æˆ‘æ·±å…¥æŸ¥çœ‹ Vue ç»„ä»¶çš„å…·ä½“å®ç°ï¼š ç°åœ¨è®©æˆ‘æŸ¥çœ‹æ ¸å¿ƒçš„ composable å’Œç»„ä»¶å®ç°ï¼š ç°åœ¨è®©æˆ‘çœ‹çœ‹ React ç‰ˆæœ¬ç›®å‰çš„å®ç°ï¼š å†çœ‹çœ‹ React ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„å…¶ä»–ç»„ä»¶å’Œ contextï¼š è®©æˆ‘ä¹Ÿçœ‹çœ‹ providers å’Œ utils éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼š è®©æˆ‘å†æŸ¥çœ‹ factory å’Œ utils çš„å…³é”®å®ç°ï¼š ç°åœ¨è®©æˆ‘å†æŸ¥çœ‹ä¸€ä¸ªå¤æ‚ç»„ä»¶ï¼ˆcollapsibleï¼‰çš„å®ç°å¯¹æ¯”ï¼š è®©æˆ‘æŸ¥çœ‹ Vue å’Œ React çš„ä¸»å…¥å£æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š ç°åœ¨æˆ‘å·²ç»æœ‰è¶³å¤Ÿçš„ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ¥ä¸ºä½ åšä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´çš„åˆ†æã€‚è®©æˆ‘æŸ¥çœ‹ React ç»„ä»¶ç›®å½•çš„ç°çŠ¶ï¼š ç°åœ¨æˆ‘å¯¹é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„æœ‰äº†å®Œæ•´çš„äº†è§£ã€‚è®©æˆ‘ä¸ºä½ åšä¸€ä¸ªå…¨é¢çš„åˆ†æã€‚

## Vue ç»„ä»¶ç¼–å†™é¡ºåºä¸ React è¿ç§»æŒ‡å—

| æ–‡ä»¶ | Vue | React | è¯´æ˜ |

```
           â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
```

---

### ğŸ“ ç¼–å†™é¡ºåºï¼ˆæ¨èï¼‰

æ ¹æ® Vue ä»£ç åˆ†æï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ç¼–å†™ React ç»„ä»¶çš„æœ€ä½³é¡ºåºï¼š

#### **Step 1: `anatomy.ts`** (æœ€ç®€å•)
```typescript
// ç›´æ¥ä» @destyler/<component> å¯¼å‡º
export { anatomy as collapseAnatomy } from '@destyler/collapse'
```

#### **Step 2: hooks/use-<component>.ts** (æ ¸å¿ƒé€»è¾‘)

**Vue ç‰ˆæœ¬æ¨¡å¼:**
```typescript
// Vue: ä½¿ç”¨ computed + emit
const context = computed<collapse.Context>(() => ({
  id,
  dir: locale.value.dir,
  value: props.modelValue ?? props.defaultValue,
  getRootNode: env?.value.getRootNode,
  onValueChange: (details) => {
    emit?.('valueChange', details)
    emit?.('update:modelValue', details.value)  // v-model
  },
  ...cleanProps(props),
}))
const [state, send] = useMachine(collapse.machine(context.value), { context })
return computed(() => collapse.connect(state.value, send, normalizeProps))
```

**React ç‰ˆæœ¬æ¨¡å¼:**
```typescript
// React: ä½¿ç”¨ initialContext + context åˆ†ç¦»ï¼ŒuseEvent åŒ…è£…å›è°ƒ
const initialContext: collapse.Context = {
  id: useId(),
  dir,
  getRootNode,
  value: props.defaultValue,  // åˆå§‹å€¼
  ...props,
}

const context: collapse.Context = {
  ...initialContext,
  value: props.value,  // å—æ§å€¼
  onValueChange: useEvent(props.onValueChange),  // å›è°ƒç¨³å®šåŒ–
}

const [state, send] = useMachine(collapse.machine(initialContext), { context })
return collapse.connect(state, send, normalizeProps)
```

**å…³é”®å·®å¼‚ï¼š**
| Vue | React |
|-----|-------|
| `modelValue` / `update:modelValue` | `value` / `onValueChange` å›è°ƒ |
| `computed(() => ...)` åŒ…è£…è¿”å›å€¼ | ç›´æ¥è¿”å› API å¯¹è±¡ |
| `emit?.('event', data)` | `useEvent(props.onCallback)` |

#### **Step 3: hooks/use-<component>-context.ts** (Context)

**Vue:**
```typescript
import { createContext } from '~/utils'
export const [CollapseProvider, useCollapseContext] = createContext<UseCollapseContext>('CollapseContext')
```

**React:**
```typescript
import { createContext } from '~/utils/create-context'
export const [CollapseProvider, useCollapseContext] = createContext<UseCollapseContext>({
  name: 'CollapseContext',
  hookName: 'useCollapseContext',
  providerName: '<CollapseProvider />',
})
```

#### **Step 4: `Root.tsx`** (æ ¹ç»„ä»¶)

**Vue:**
```vue
<script setup lang="ts">
const collapse = useCollapse(props, emits)
CollapseProvider(collapse)  // æä¾› context
RenderStrategyPropsProvider(computed(() => ({ lazyMount, unmountOnExit })))
useForwardExpose()
</script>

<template>
  <ui.div v-bind="collapse.getRootProps()" :as-child="props.asChild">
    <slot></slot>
  </ui.div>
</template>
```

**React:**
```tsx
export const CollapseRoot = forwardRef<HTMLDivElement, CollapseRootProps>((props, ref) => {
  const [renderStrategyProps, collapseProps] = splitRenderStrategyProps(props)
  const [useCollapseProps, localProps] = createSplitProps<UseCollapseProps>()(collapseProps, [...])
  
  const collapse = useCollapse(useCollapseProps)
  const mergedProps = mergeProps(collapse.getRootProps(), localProps)

  return (
    <CollapseProvider value={collapse}>
      <RenderStrategyPropsProvider value={renderStrategyProps}>
        <ui.div {...mergedProps} ref={ref} />
      </RenderStrategyPropsProvider>
    </CollapseProvider>
  )
})
```

**å…³é”®å·®å¼‚ï¼š**
| Vue | React |
|-----|-------|
| `<slot></slot>` | `children` (éšå¼) |
| `v-bind="props"` | `{...props}` spread |
| `useForwardExpose()` | `forwardRef()` |
| `withDefaults()` | props è§£æ„é»˜è®¤å€¼ |

#### **Step 5: å­ç»„ä»¶ (Item, ItemContent, ItemTrigger...)**

è¿™äº›ç»„ä»¶æ¶ˆè´¹çˆ¶çº§ Contextï¼Œå¹¶å¯èƒ½åµŒå¥—å…¶ä»–ç»„ä»¶ï¼ˆå¦‚ `CollapseItem` å†…éƒ¨ä½¿ç”¨ `Collapsible.Root`ï¼‰ã€‚

---

### ğŸ›  React ç‰ˆæœ¬å¾…å®Œæˆæ¸…å•

æ ¹æ®å½“å‰ React åŒ…çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œä½ éœ€è¦ï¼š

```
å·²æœ‰ç»„ä»¶: collapsible, collapse, checkbox, clipboard, field, fieldset, avatar
å¾…æ·»åŠ ç»„ä»¶: (ä» Vue ç‰ˆæœ¬ç§»æ¤)
  - aspect-ratio, breadcrumbs, calendar, carousel
  - color-picker, combobox, dialog, edit
  - file-upload, floating-panel, hover-card
  - label, menu, navigation-menu
  - number-input, otp-input, pagination, popover
  - presence, progress, qr-code, radio
  - scroll-area, select, separator, signature
  - slider, splitter, steps, switch
  - tabs, timer, toast, toggle
  - toggle-group, tooltip, tour, tree
```

---

### âœ… æ ¸å¿ƒè½¬æ¢è§„åˆ™

| Vue æ¨¡å¼ | React ç­‰æ•ˆ |
|----------|-----------|
| `defineProps<T>()` | `interface Props` + å‡½æ•°å‚æ•° |
| `defineEmits<T>()` | Props ä¸­çš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•° |
| `v-model="value"` | `value` + `onValueChange` |
| `provide/inject` | `React.createContext` |
| `computed(() => x)` | `useMemo(() => x, deps)` æˆ–ç›´æ¥è®¡ç®— |
| `watch(source, cb)` | `useEffect(() => cb, [deps])` |
| `ref()` | `useRef()` æˆ– `useState()` |
| `useForwardExpose()` | `forwardRef()` |
| `<slot>` | `children` prop |
| `<slot name="x">` | render prop æˆ–å‘½å children |

---

### ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®å¼€å‘é¡ºåº

1. **åŸºç¡€ç»„ä»¶ä¼˜å…ˆ**: `presence`, `label`, `separator` (ä¾èµ–å°‘)
2. **è¡¨å•ç»„ä»¶**: `radio`, `switch`, `slider`, `number-input`
3. **å¤åˆç»„ä»¶**: `tabs`, `dialog`, `popover`, `menu`
4. **å¤æ‚ç»„ä»¶**: `select`, `combobox`, `date-picker`

éœ€è¦æˆ‘å¸®ä½ å¼€å§‹ç¼–å†™æŸä¸ªå…·ä½“ç»„ä»¶å—ï¼Ÿ

### ğŸ—ï¸ ä¸‰å±‚æ¶æ„

```

â”‚                      Layer 0: åŸºç¡€ç»„ä»¶ (æ— ä¾èµ–)                       â”‚
â”œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¤
```
